Package representations

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constraint
    A constraint is a requirement of the variable's values
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllCompareConstraint
    This class compares the values of constraint
    AllDifferentConstraint
    This class represents all the values with different constraints
    AllEqualConstraint
    This class represents all the values with equal constraints
    ConstraintAnd
    this class is an AND combination between two constraints
    ConstraintBool
    This abstract classe is a boolean combination between two constraints (And or OR)
    ConstraintOr
    this class is an OR combination between two constraints
    Disjunction
    A Disjunction is an OR between variables : a=1 || b=0 || c=6 || ...
    IncompatibilityConstraint
    The incompatibility is the rule : !
    Main  
    Rule
    A Rule is a constraint that represents an implication : a implies b
    Variable
    A variable is represented by a name and a domain
